mapper.select: select * from category where parent_id = #{pickParentId} and use_yn = 'y'
with recursive cte as ( select * from category where name = 'root' union all select f.* from category f inner join cte on f.parent_id = cte.id ) select * from cte;
mapper.insert: insert into counsel (category_id, charger_id, title, content, customer_name, customer_email, status, creator_id, modifier_id, created_at, modified_at) values (#{category_id}, "not assigned",#{title},#{content},#{customer_name},#{customer_email},"unsolved",#{creator_id},#{modifier_id} , now(), now())
